About the film:
Based on the eponymous short story by Andrei Platonov.
In the village everyone was waiting for Electrical Engineering Green, who knows how to make the light and what to do with the light of knowledge, bearing well-being. And the master came. However, the engine exploded and people have lost hope, but each has awakened a desire to do better, to revive the parched earth ...
